entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:39 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
